sn19.12:1.1: “Idhaham, avuso, gijjhakuta pabbata orohanto addasam purisam guthakupe nimuggam ubhohi hatthehi gutham khadantam …pe…
sn19.12:1.2: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmimyeva rajagahe dutthabrahmano ahosi.
sn19.12:1.3: So kassapassa sammasambuddhassa pavacane bhikkhusangham bhattena nimantetva doniyo guthassa purapetva etadavoca—
sn19.12:1.4: aho bhonto yavadattham bhunjantu ceva harantu ca’ti …pe….
